Author: daintyyeo
Text: i relate to this so much! i am still struggling to realize that im not a size M/L but mostly an XS. Especially with pants, i mostly grab sizes that are a lot bigger, but subconsciously? i would think they fit, but. they end up being the double of my size. I personally think that it has something to do with me not wanting to be disappointed by sizes that may be to small for me.

Author: JuBelen
Text: The same thing happens to me. My sister's always been smaller than me, but lately she's hit the gym and got #thick so she gave me a bunch of her jeans. They all fit, one is even too big for me. None of my clothes from a year ago fit me, they are too big. But I see myself in the mirror and I look the same. It's freaky.
